article: Ann is one of my  friends  .She lives in a big city. She has many pets,  _  cats, goldfish and birds. Her favorite pet is a cat  _  name is Mimi. It likes eating birds. One day,  _  father buys her a parrot . Mimi sees the parrot and wants  to know  if it is a bird or not. So Mimi comes over  _  the parrot, it wants to eat  _  parrot. The poor parrot is very afraid. When Mimi  is close to  it, and wants to jump on it, the parrot  _  , "Hello, nice to meet you ." Mimi is afraid, and it runs away quickly. It thinks: "That thing can speak. It must  _  a man."
